posts.post_title: For Sale: T3 Nap Rucker PSA 5 MK - SOLD

Posted By: nbrazil
T3 Rucker PSA 5 MK: SOLD

Price includes S&H. Does not include insurance. If you want insurance, I will need to factor that into the price. I accept paypal, MO and checks. Emails take higher priority over posts on this thread. Only cards willing to trade for is a T206 magie. thanks!
